message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper focuses on person re-identification using convolutional neural networks, which is a popular topic in computer vision (CV) research. Therefore, cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a Siamese network that simultaneously computes identification loss and verification loss, which involves learning a discriminative embedding and similarity measurement. This suggests that the paper may also fall under the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), multimedia (cs.MM), information retrieval (cs.IR), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
